approach: Greedy beam search constructive heuristic for small N (N=2-5)
conclusion: Greedy beam search produces WORSE solutions than baseline. The baseline configurations are highly optimized and cannot be beaten by constructive heuristics. After 29 experiments, ALL approaches fail to improve beyond 70.624381.
note: The baseline is at an EXTREMELY STRONG LOCAL OPTIMUM that represents a fundamentally good packing structure.
